messages.content:
Hi Kane, 
My name is Lucrezia I am an intern at UNHCR. Before working for free ahah I studied in the states for my bachelor where I graduated in 2016 right after I moved to DC for my MA and then to London for my LLM form which I graduated just last January. In April I started my adventure at UNHCR. I am currently in DC until July 18th for summer school meaning that I am working remotely during the day for UNHCR and studying at night. 
I am very interested in your offer. I will be i Geneva until October 31st with possible extension until December. 
I am looking forward to hearing from you. 
Bests, 
Lucrezia
